thread.title: Probes under way as M1 reopens
thread.title_full: Probes under way as M1 reopens | News24

author: news24.com
title: Probes under way as M1 reopens
text:
Johannesburg – Gauteng’s M1 highway reopened on Thursday, nearly 24 hours after a bridge under construction collapsed, killing two people, injuring another 21 and causing traffic chaos.
A labour department investigation was under way into what had caused the scaffolding across the M1 at Grayston Drive to collapse on Wednesday afternoon, spokesperson Sithembile Tshwete said.
A minibus taxi driver and a man in a Toyota Fortuner were killed.
Tshwete said a preliminary report would be compiled and a decision be made on whether a formal inquiry needed to be held. It would be established if the Gauteng government or the construction company Murray & Roberts were at fault.
